text: wwudie kitab 'aemal kl wahid fy ymynh 'aw fi shmalh, ftbsr alesat khayifin mimaa fih bsbb ma qadamuh min jraymhm, wayaqulun hin yeaynwnh: ya hlakna! ma lhdha alkitab lm yatruk saghirat min afealna wala kabiratan 'iilaa athbtha?! wawajaduu kl ma emlwh fi aldunya hadrana mthbtana. wala yazlim rabuk ahdana mithqal dhrt, fala yunqas taye min thwabh, wala yuzad eas fi eqabh
